text:
April 24, t942
Dr. Irvin Stewart
Committee on Scientific Aids
to Learninc
41 East 42np Street
New York City, New York
Dear Or. Stewart:
In checking over our accounts for 1942 t note that
t FAILED TO SEND YOU A STATEMENT FOR THE NAEB NEWS
Letter subscription for 1942. Assuming that you
still wish to receive the Letter, f am enclosing
triplicate copies of our statement for 1942. * HOPE
to see you in Columbus.
Cordially yours
F£S:SL
Frank £, Schooley
Executive Secretary
